titleStmt.title: Five godlie sermons, preached by R.T. Bachiler of diuinitie. 1. The charge of the cleargie. 2. The crowne of Christians. 3. The annointment of Christ, or Christian ointment. 4. A festiuall sermon vpon the Natiuitie of Christ. 5. The fruits of hypocrisie..
Five godlie and learned sermons
titleStmt.author: Tyrer, Ralph, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. H[arrison 3] for Iohn Harison [1].,

notesStmt.note: An issue, with title page cancelled and new preliminaries, of: Tyrer, Ralph. Five godlie and learned sermons (STC 24475).
All copies have leaf A1 removed.
Signatures: [par.]8 A8(-A1) B-T8 V4(last leaf blank).
Incorrectly identified as STC 24475 at reel 582:14.
Reproductions of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
